thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Roger Bannister, First to Run Sub Four-Minute Mile, Dies at 88

author: wsjcom
title: Roger Bannister, First to Run Sub Four-Minute Mile, Dies at 88
text:
Roger Bannister, the first runner to break the 4-minute barrier in the mile, has died. He was 88.
Mr. Bannisterâ€™s family said in a statement that he died peacefully on Saturday in Oxford, the English city where the runner cracked the feat many had thought humanly impossible on a windy afternoon in 1954.
Mr. Bannister, who went on to pursue...
